availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Nicholas Sandifer (Judge of Garrard County Court)

body.p: Lancaster, Kentucky, county judge. Kentucky native. Married to Mary J. Green in Garrard County, Kentucky on August 14, 1845. Presiding judge of Garrard County Court in Garrard County from c1860 to c1864.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Garrard, Lancaster, p. 4.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records - Microfilm (1852-1910), KDLA, Roll #000183256, Garrard County Marriages, p. 35.
Nicholas Sandifer, “Autobiography: Of Judge Nicholas Sandifer,” The Register of Kentucky History 60, No. 3 (July, 1962), 167-182.
Find A Grave, “Judge Nicholas Sandifer (March 18, 1818-February 24, 1905),” Memorial #82074083, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/82074083 (accessed June 4, 2017).
